description: Monitor for the unexpected creation of memory dump files for processes that may contain credentials. Analytic 1 - Unexpected memory dump file creation. (index=security sourcetype="WinEventLog:Security" EventCode=4663 ObjectName IN ("*lsass*.dmp", "*\\config\\SAM", "*\\ntds.dit", "*\\policy\\secrets", "*\\cache")) OR (index=security sourcetype="linux_secure" (key="path" value IN ("/etc/passwd", "/etc/shadow"))) OR (index=security sourcetype="macOS:UnifiedLog" message IN ("/var/db/shadow/hash/*", "/private/etc/master.passwd"))
